summary: On their chase of a serial killer two cops find a diary in which all committed murders and many more to come are predicted.
cast: Ki-beom Jang|Oh Jeong-Se|Yun Ju-sang|Ji-min Kim|Kkobbi Kim|Yunjin Kim|Yu-su Lee|Se-chang Maeng|Eric Moon|Eun-Kyung Shin|Hyeon-ji Yu
keywords: murder|diary|bloody body of a child|killed in an elevator|topless female nudity
title: Yu-wol-ui il-gi
